**Cloudcandy Host - Hosting Your Ideas!**

**About Cloudcandy Host[cc]**

Cloudcandy host is a innovative company founded as a provider of secure & reliable web hosting solutions at affordable prices. At Cloudcandy host we are a lot like you, which makes it easier for us to understand what a client expects from us and delivery exactly that.

Today, our hosting solutions power over a million websites and businesses rely on our web hosting solutions. We investigate, analyze everything seriously to provide a complete one stop hosting solutions for you and your business.

**Top reasons to choose Cloudcandy Host[cc] ?:**

**LEADING BRAND HARDWARE WITH CUTTING EDGE TECHNOLOGY:** All our servers run on physical servers with multiple 2GHZ Intel XEON processors, which is connected to multi gigabit networks. 

**24/7 SUPPORT FROM HIGHLY SKILLED STAFF:**  We only hire the best people, who would listen to you and help you solve the issue. Our support staff work 24/7/365 days by chat, Skype or support request.

**99.9% UPTIME SLA:** We have a strict SLA which means we will credit you should we not achieve our high levels of uptime.

**AFFORDABLE PRICING:** Our prices are competitive but that doesn't mean we cut corners on the hardware’s either, we combine quality hosting and support brilliantly.

**MULTIPLE SERVER LOCATIONS:** The world is going Global and we provide hosting solutions across the globe with our servers deployed in Europe, Asia, Russia and USA.
